message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I take a bit more as I'm starting the game.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This is a fairer split considering I get to propose in a later round if this fails.
The value decreases quickly, Bob. Let's meet in the middle this time. This is the same split you offered, just reversed.
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm meeting you closer to the middle, but I need a slight advantage for proposing later.
Time is running out, Bob. This is very close to your offer - let's settle and avoid losing more to inflation.
